abstract_summ: New York State is an epicenter of the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic in the United States . Cumulative incidence was highest in New York City (NYC) 22.7% (95% CI: 21.5-24.0%) and higher among Hispanic/Latino (29.2%), non-Hispanic black/African American (20.2%) than non- Hispanic white adults . An estimated 8.9% of infections in NYS were diagnosed .
